subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa told The St. Louis Post-Dispatch that he would be back for a 13th season with St. Louis, barring complications in discussions with the team’s chairman, Bill DeWitt Jr. His three-year deal expired at the end of the season.
